name: Lechner-McFadden Community Council
description: 1.) Create a council that supports itself through trust, cooperation, and initiative without relying on a central authority. 2.) Encourage students to take advantage of all activities and experiences offered by the University and the community. 3.) Develop a desirable atmosphere of learning and achieve a spirit of fellowship among the residents of Lechner & McFadden Halls. 4.) Provide an avenue by which the residents may express ideas, concerns, and opinions to the University 5.) Encourage high standards of character, leadership, scholarship, sportsmanship, and school spirit.
